org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.buffer

类 LocalBufferPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.buffer.LocalBufferPool
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    BufferPool, BufferProvider, BufferRecycler

    class LocalBufferPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements BufferPool
    A buffer pool used to manage a number of Buffer instances from the NetworkBufferPool.

    Buffer requests are mediated to the network buffer pool to ensure dead-lock free operation of the network stack by limiting the number of buffers per local buffer pool. It also implements the default mechanism for buffer recycling, which ensures that every buffer is ultimately returned to the network buffer pool.

    The size of this pool can be dynamically changed at runtime (setNumBuffers(int). It will then lazily return the required number of buffers to the NetworkBufferPool to match its new size.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      LocalBufferPool(NetworkBufferPool networkBufferPool, int numberOfRequiredMemorySegments)
      Local buffer pool based on the given networkBufferPool with a minimal number of network buffers being available.
      LocalBufferPool(NetworkBufferPool networkBufferPool, int numberOfRequiredMemorySegments, int maxNumberOfMemorySegments)
      Local buffer pool based on the given networkBufferPool with a minimal and maximal number of network buffers being available.

    • 字段详细资料

      • LOG

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • networkBufferPool

        private final NetworkBufferPool networkBufferPool
        Global network buffer pool to get buffers from.

      • numberOfRequiredMemorySegments

        private final int numberOfRequiredMemorySegments
        The minimum number of required segments for this pool

      • availableMemorySegments

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<MemorySegment> availableMemorySegments
        The currently available memory segments. These are segments, which have been requested from the network buffer pool and are currently not handed out as Buffer instances.

      • registeredListeners

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<BufferListener> registeredListeners
        Buffer availability listeners, which need to be notified when a Buffer becomes available. Listeners can only be registered at a time/state where no Buffer instance was available.

      • maxNumberOfMemorySegments

        private final int maxNumberOfMemorySegments
        Maximum number of network buffers to allocate.

      • currentPoolSize

        private int currentPoolSize
        The current size of this pool

      • numberOfRequestedMemorySegments

        private int numberOfRequestedMemorySegments
        Number of all memory segments, which have been requested from the network buffer pool and are somehow referenced through this pool (e.g. wrapped in Buffer instances or as available segments).

      • isDestroyed

        private boolean isDestroyed

      • owner

        private BufferPoolOwner owner

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LocalBufferPool

        LocalBufferPool(NetworkBufferPool networkBufferPool,
                int numberOfRequiredMemorySegments)
        Local buffer pool based on the given networkBufferPool with a minimal number of network buffers being available.
        参数:
        networkBufferPool - global network buffer pool to get buffers from
        numberOfRequiredMemorySegments - minimum number of network buffers

      • LocalBufferPool

        LocalBufferPool(NetworkBufferPool networkBufferPool,
                int numberOfRequiredMemorySegments,
                int maxNumberOfMemorySegments)
        Local buffer pool based on the given networkBufferPool with a minimal and maximal number of network buffers being available.
        参数:
        networkBufferPool - global network buffer pool to get buffers from
        numberOfRequiredMemorySegments - minimum number of network buffers
        maxNumberOfMemorySegments - maximum number of network buffers to allocate

      • requestBuffer

        public Buffer requestBuffer()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: BufferProvider
        Returns a Buffer instance from the buffer provider, if one is available.

        Returns null if no buffer is available or the buffer provider has been destroyed.

        指定者:

        抛出:

      • requestBufferBlocking

        public Buffer requestBufferBlocking()
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        从接口复制的说明: BufferProvider
        Returns a Buffer instance from the buffer provider.

        If there is no buffer available, the call will block until one becomes available again or the buffer provider has been destroyed.

        指定者:
        requestBufferBlocking 在接口中 BufferProvider
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
